Lightning talk presented alongside a poster session at [RSECon23](https://rsecon23.society-rse.org), Swansea University during 5-7 September 2023.

Also volunteered for the conference, was part of the [conference committee](https://rsecon23.society-rse.org/conference-committee/) and organised and participated in the RSE Worldwide session too.
